text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's the day of the Tracen Meet,<n>where the students choose
their own<n>events to race in.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Every year the academy booms with<n>energy as visitors
flood the campus.<n>In all that uproar, an unstoppable<n>voice
rises above the rest.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Rrraaaaagh! I wanna go faaaaast!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
You know it! This is the perfect<n>chance for everyone to see
the fruits<n>of our training!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
It seems like lots of debuting students<n>are doing the same
1,700-meter turf<n>race that I chose...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Oh, um, what was this called again?<n>The pre... pre-lee...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: The preliminaries.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, yeah! THAT! Oh, is that you,<n>Hayahide? Gooood
morning!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Good morning. I'm glad to see<n>you're in high spirits, Ticket.
A lack of<n>anxiety means you can achieve your<n>full
potential.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Heh-heh! Yep! All thanks to my trainer<n>here!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Oh, that's right! Let me introduce youto my classmate, Hayahide! She'sSUPER smart!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: And if she's here, that means... Let's<n>seeeee...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ah-ha! Taishiiin! Get over here,<n>youuu!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Ugh! Keep your big dumb voice down,<n>stupid! Everyone's
looking!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Hahaha! Sorry, sorry! But I'm so<n>happy to see you two!
Hayahide, I<n>didn't think you'd be here yet since<n>your race
is in the afternoon!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Well, I wanted to observe your run.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Awww! Thank youuu! I'm going to<n>give it my best shot!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
And what about you, Taishin? Hold on<n>a sec—didn't you tell
me you usually<n>skip these "boring" events?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
I was just taking a walk and<n>happened to pass through.
It's<n>irritatingly noisy though, so I'm out.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: No way! You're going home already?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
But you have to see me show my<n>stuff in the raaace! Don't
make me all<n>saaad! Waaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Ugh, geez, quit crying, you baby!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: I'm still leaving though. Later.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Nooo! TAISHIIIIIN!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Worry not, Ticket. Taishin went in the<n>direction of the
spectator stands.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ah, really?! T-T-Taishiiin! I'm SOtouched by your super awkwardfriendship!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As the heartwarming scene comes to<n>an end, the time for
Winning Ticket to<n>run arrives at long last.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hey, Traaaineeer! It's time! I'm<n>finally racing!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
You've been such a great trainer to<n>stick with me. I... I could
just... Ngh!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: No, no, no! I need to tell you<n>something before I start crying!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Well... I don't think I've ever inspired<n>anyone with my
running.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
But still! I met you and learned a lot<n>from our training. So,
now... now I...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Nnngaaah! The words aren't<n>comiiiiing!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Sorry! I'll just have to show you in<n>the race!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Ka-chak!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The 1,700-meter turf begins! But what<n>kind of show will
these potential stars<n>give us?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff, huff...

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Winning Ticket pulls out ahead! It's a<n>strong, yet controlled,
pace!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: (Hm? Huh?! What is this? It's so<n>weird!)

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
(Is it 'cause we trained together all<n>that time? Did I learn
this from all the<n>talking we did every day?)

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
(Stay calm and watch your<n>surroundings. Think about
pacing. Stay<n>at your own speed... It's like I can<n>hear
Trainer's voice in my head.)

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Her running's different. When<n>did she learn how to
do that...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Fascinating! Heh, you've met a fine<n>trainer, Ticket!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: (I understand... I see it, Trainer!)

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: It's the stretch! This is it, right?! Time<n>for full poweeeeer!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Winning Ticket's speeding up! She's<n>leaving everyone
behind!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
She's going! She's really moving!<n>What an incredible burst
of speed!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Urrraaaaagh!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: FINISH! Winning Ticket takes first!<n>What a stunning victory!

text_block_list.name: Spectators
text_block_list.text: Wooo!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Thanks for cheering for me,<n>everyooone!

text_block_list.name: Spectators
text_block_list.text: Congratulations, Ticket! You were<n>amazing!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Waaah, thank you, thank yooou! I'm<n>so HAPPYYY!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I'll return the favor... Someday I'll be<n>an Umamusume who
inspires<n>everyone!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
That's why... I wanna vow to<n>everyone here, as well as the
trainer<n>who taught me how to run!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I promise... to become a Derby<n>champiooon!

text_block_list.name: Spectators
text_block_list.text: Wooo!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Unlike at the tryouts, not one person<n>doubts her words now.
